item.title: Rep. Clyde to Newsmax: Judge McConnell Needs to Be 'Impeached'
item.description: Rep. Andrew Clyde, R-Ga., told Newsmax on Tuesday that U.S. District Judge John McConnell Jr. has "exceeded his authority."
